JOB DESCRIPTION: Paid Internship - PHP/MySQL Full-Stack Software Developer    Description    Supernova Systems are the leading Website development company located in Satara   Our internship is based on current industries needs and industry standards that help candidates to secure their career   We offer live projects based internship for enhancing corporate exposure   We use a variety of technologies, including PHP, MySQL, Javascript, AJAX, JQuery, AngularJS, NodeJS and Git and CMS like WordPress and Joomla   We are always looking for Interns to join our team and to bring in fresh ideas and solutions to our customer s IT problems.    Applicants should have the following     Must have basic knowledge in PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS, JavaScript/jQuery & AJAX.     Must have good communication skills     Must have Strong analytical, problem-solving skills.     Excellent knowledge of the application of concepts for coding & should be result-oriented.     Qualifications    BE Computer, BE IT, MCA, MCS    Duration    75 Days    Contacts
